info.name: Google Inbox Dark Theme - by fuba
info.description:
This Style turn of the lights at Google Inbox ;)
Inspired by the Chrome Plugin "Google Inbox Dark Skin" from Chrome Webstore.
But this Style is more extended!

data.title: Can we get rid of the random navy color? Or at least give us an option for it?
